content: Bombard your liver with alcohol delivered from these bombs away shot glasses. These unique shot glasses feature an interior mold that will fill up in the shape of a classic bomb, making them ideal for drinking Jagerbombs, Irish car bombs, or even cherry bombs.

Spy on anyone your invasive little heart desires with this clever camera spy lens. The camera spy lens attaches to your DSLR and allows you to appear as if you are shooting pictures in front of you, when in reality you are snapping photos in a completely opposite direction.

Keep your valuables hidden in plain sight with this clever faux wall outlet safe. This easy to install safe can replace an existing wall outlet, or you can simply cut open a small hole in your walls to place it – it’s ideal for hiding money, jewelry, and other small items from burgulars.

Your romantic night doesn’t have to come to an end just because of a little rain – the two person umbrella will allow you and your date to stay dry while also facilitating you to get in each others comfort zone… making the two person umbrella the ultimate wingman.

Arm yourself with some killer keys with these pistol shaped key covers. Featuring both the traditional handgun and magnum styles, this two pack of deadly rubber key covers make an excellent gift idea to pass out at the local NRA meetings.

Now you can toss the pigskin around even in the middle of the night thanks to this light up football. This durable and battery powered LED football is good for 20 hours of night time football tossing, and can be seen up to 100 yards away!

Make baking cookies even more fun now with the jigsaw puzzle cookie cutter. For the truly creative cookie bakers, grab some colored icing and turned these jigsaw puzzle cookies into an actual solvable jigsaw by drawing a picture on the combined pieces, then scatter them up!

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Nail Polish
content: Give your nails a sexy and entrancing look with this glow in the dark nail polish. Available in a variety of eye catching colors, the glow in the dark nail polish is perfect for black light parties, or when you just want to always have a light source on your body.

Keep your valuables hidden where nobody would want to look with the stained underwear wallet. These doo-doo stained tighty whiteys will allow you to keep your valuables in plain sight, and are great for ensuring your stuff is left alone by security while traveling by plane.

Light up your bedroom like never before with the illuminated night stand. Perfect for giving your bed area a modern look, this illuminated night stand is made from a durable plastic and is also available in other illuminated styles to suit your household needs.

Now you can chill your drinks with these brain freeze ice cubes. This clever silicone mold allows you to make realistic looking frozen brain ice cubes that will foreshadow how your own cranium will start to feel if you chug down your frozen drink too quickly.

Relive the glory days of owning friends and NPCs in Goldeneye with this USB Nintendo 64 controller. This nostalgic N64 controller allows you to truly play like you did during the golden age of gaming with arguably the <del>ugliest and most uncomfortable</del> best controller ever made.

Easily pick up where you last stopped reading with this “be right back” bookmark. Perfect for avid readers, the metal BRB bookmark is a clever tool that everyone in your book club will be jealous of. Also available are similar metal bookmark sayings such as “You are here”.

Protect your hands when you foolishly forget that the oven is piping hot with these oven rack burn shields. Designed to allow you handle a heated oven rack with your vulnerable bare hands, these burn shields are perfect for the forgetful and clumsy cook.

Satisfy your debilitating lust for chocolate and peanut butter with this massive peanut butter cupcake that looks like a super-sized Reese’s cupcakes. These delicious cakes feature house made peanut butter filling sandwiched between two layers of rich dark chocolate.

Wear flippy floppies that can double as party starters with these durable beer bottle opening sandals. Perfect for a day at the beach with some brewskis, these bottle opening sandals will ensure you’ll always have a quick and easy way to crack open a cold one.

Show the cook how much you ‘Like’ their edible creations by giving them a Facebook Like Button inspired oven mitt. This clever oven mitt is a great gift idea for Facebook addicts who love to cook – though a much desired ‘Dislike’ button oven mitt is still unavailable.

Go green while still staying stylish with these wooden watches. Available in a variety of popular watch styles, these wooden watches offer the same functionality as a traditional watch, but have a beautifully crafted natural wood exterior.

Keep your staircase free from random toys and small objects by storing them in this clever staircase basket. This uniquely designed basket is shaped so it perfectly fits in between two stairs, giving you an organized storage center so your staircase is clean and tidy.

Brown paper bags are great – they conceal the giant alcoholic drink you’re carrying and they up your street cred, but what about insulation? Introducing the brown paper bag beer koozie: it’ll keep your beer insulated while still giving you that alcoholic bummy look you’re going for.

Be prepared for an all out snowball war this winter with this snowball slingshot that also functions as a perfect snowball maker. Capable of launching a snowball 80 feet in distance, this heavy duty slingshot will easily make you top dog of the winter snowball battles.

Now you can stop stumbling to open the front door to your house late at night with this solar touch keyhole light. Regardless of whether you have trouble seeing at night or are just drunk, this solar powered keyhole light will make finding the front door key hole a breeze.

Get your nails did like never before with these glow in the dark nails. These glow stick style press on nails are activated similarly to an actual glow stick – just slighty bend these multi-colored nails and they will brightly light up any dark area.

Now you can load up on small finger foods and drinks without feeling encumbered with this one handed party plate! Perfect for BBQs and parties in general, this clever plate lets you carry your food and your drink easily with one hand.

Save your thumbs from getting smashed by your clumsy hammering skills with this magnetic nail holder. Designed to hold a nail in place while keeping your thumb a safe distance from the impact point, the magnetic nail holder is a must have tool for the clumsy handyman.

Take fun to new heights with this giant wooden stacking blocks game. With the ability to create a tower over four feet tall, these giant wooden tower building blocks are great for the outdoors, and come with a handy travel bag.

Cook up a loaded breakfast with this egg frying mold that is shaped like a handgun. Perfect for cooking up a breakfast that’s to die for, this functional pistol shaped egg frying mold is made from stainless steel and work great for cooking up breakfast for an NRA meeting.

Work on your stroke while you do work on the porcelain throne with this mini-golf putting game. Perfect for any size bathroom, the toilet mini-golf game is a great gift idea for the golfing enthusiast and comes with a putting green, two balls, and a mini putter.

The practicality of red plastic cups now comes in a convenient shot sized cup so you can get wasted and not have to worry about washing shot glasses the next day. At an adorable 1.75 ounce liquid capacity, these plastic cups are perfect for drinking parties.

Turn your dog to the dark side with this Darth Vader dog costume. Included in this geeky dog costume is the iconic helmet and suit with gloves and the cape attached. Now all you need is a Sith bathrobe to be the perfect master to your dark apprentice.

Light up your home or office with these Tetris lights that brightly glow when they are pieced together. Perfect for retro gamers who found the game of Tetris harder to quit than crystal meth, these geeky lights will be a conversation starter wherever you put them.

Add a real foosball table to your home without making it look like a total bachelor pad with this foosball coffee table. This furniture grade coffee table features an elegant hardwood design that incorporates a real foosball table into it, giving you the best of both worlds.

Easily fit pieces of ice into your water bottle with this clever ice cube sticks tray. For decades mankind has been baffled by how to properly chill plastic water bottles, but with this revolutionary ice cube tray you’ll no longer have to suffer from drinking warm water.

There might not be an app to end the heat wave going on, but at least now you can keep cool with this iPhone fan. This compact and soft blade winged fan connects to and is powered by your iPhone, giving off a cool breeze and making your iPhone that much more useful.

Now you can hollow out a strawberry with ease thanks to this amazing strawberry hollowing tool. Perfect for prepping strawberries for a multitude of dessert styles, this strawberry hollowing tool is easy to use and easy to clean, and can also be used on other fruits.

Stay versatile with this modular quad lantern that features four removable LED panels that each function as a flashlight on their own. It’s perfect for setting up some impromptu lighting while going camping or just hanging out in the backyard.

Make pizza in the shape of an ice cream cone with this incredible pizza cone maker kit. Included in this easy to use set are two pizza cones that have a non-stick coating for quick cleanup, along with easy to follow instructions so you can clog your arteries in no time!

Keep your coffee table protected from water stains with these geeky and pixelated Minecraft drink coasters. Included in this coaster set are eight styles including the grass block, creeper block, gold block, lava block, and many more from the wildly popular Minecraft game.

Ride around looking like the Dark Knight with this replica Batman motorcycle suit. This highly detailed wearable suit is constructed using premium leather and Kevlar inserts, giving you real protection while looking like Batman. Batcycle sold separately.

If you enjoy a frothy crown of head on your beer, this beer head foam making mug will be your new best friend. With the click of a button, this fun beer mug will add a rich bubbly foam to crown your beer – the longer you hold the button down the more head you get.

Turn your home into a rock climbing gymnasium with these easy to install rock climbing wall panels. These modular climbable panels feature 20 hand holds and can be combined in a variety of ways to create a unique experience, and are great for getting some exercise.

With the netted cocooon hammock you can hang out in your backyard or in the wilderness without having mosquitoes invade your quiet personal space. The netted hammock features a mesh canopy that lets fresh air breeze through while filtering out annoying insects.

Carry your data around in this clever USB drive that is designed to look like a mini internal hard drive. With a high level of detail incorporated into every USB drive, these mini hard drives are a fun gift idea for computer science geeks, overclockers, and programmers.

titleEN: No Blind Spot Rear View Mirror
content: Quit straining your neck when you backup your car with this rear view mirror that has no blind spots. This panoramic mirror is designed to give you a complete view of your rear surroundings, and makes a great gift idea for people who drive for a living.

Now you can eliminate foggy bathroom mirrors using wiper technology akin to what your car’s windshield uses. The foggy mirror wiper is perfect for when you get out from a hot and steamy shower, allowing you to remove that foggy mirror with just a quick swipe.

Throw an amazing backyard party for children and / or drunken adults with these amazing bounce houses that feature a water slide on each side. These durable water slide bounce houses come with everything you’ll need to get the party going, including a blower to inflate it.

Enjoy a cup of coffee in the morning with this cute giraffe cup that cleverly uses the neck of the giraffe as the cup handle. These giraffe cups are all individually hand made, so each one is unique and makes for a great collectible cup to store in your cupboard.

Now you can easily catch loose hair trimmings and degrade your child all at the same time with this wonderful haircut umbrella! Perfect for giving haircuts without the hair dropping on the floor, this haircut umbrella will ensure your children will resent you for the rest of your life.

Tell people how you really feel while keeping things professional with these offensive business cards. With everything from telling people they suck at parking, to their body odor, and even their poor choice of tattoos, there’s an offensive business card for any occasion.

Mellow out and get comfy with this groovy pillow that lights up and hypnotically changes colors right before your eyes. These light up color changing pillows feature a soft and plush fabric and use AA batteries to power its groovy mind blowing performance.

Take pictures on the go with this Mini USB Camera. This mini camera is more than just a novelty item – smaller than the palm of your hand it works great as a backup camera with its two megapixels lens and up to sixteen gigabyte memory card.

Store your books on your wall like never before with these floating bookshelves. Using a clever design that conceals the supporting shelf, you simply insert the shelf in between the bottom book, and it will appear as if your entire stack of books is floating in mid air.

Creep people out while you go about your day with this magical unicorn mask. Perfect for business meetings, first dates, or anywhere there will be lots of eyeballs, the unicorn mask will prove to the world that unicorns are real and you are among their half-breed brethren.

Stop waiting for your ice cream cake to thaw when you pull it out of the freezer – now with the hand saw cake cutter you can cut through even the toughest cakes with ease using an easy to grip handle that attaches to a sharp and durable plastic blade.

Style yourself like a true drunken cowboy with these officially licensed cowboy hats made from an eighteen pack of beer. Available in all the major beer brands, from Coors to Miller Lite, these one size fits all beer cowboy hats are perfect for a drunken hoedown.

Get into some intense games of fetch the ball with your dog with this sling shot style ball launcher. Capable of shooting a tennis ball up to 220 feet in distance, this slingshot tennis ball launcher is great for a day at the park with your dog.

Practice your deadly combat strikes while dicing up a healthy salad with this karate chop lettuce chopper. These clever lettuce choppers are dishwasher safe and are a great gift idea for healthy eaters who enjoy creating their salad with a pinch violence.

Now you can secretly carry around a lighter with this deceptive lighter that looks like a pack of chewing gum. These clever pocket lighters are refillable and come in a variety of gum brand styles, with everything from Double Mint to Juicy Fruit.

Give a warm and natural look to your MacBook with this wood vinyl MacBook decal. This easy to apply MacBook decal will make your trendy laptop look like it was crafted out a hefty log and add tons of character to an already excellent product.

Just like in Super Mario, you can now become invincible by picking up a light up star – except this one also doubles as a comfy pillow. The light up star pillow is a battery operated color changing throw pillow that is a great gift idea for sleepovers and Super Mario fans.

Pay homage to Vincent van Gogh while also keeping your feet warm with these Starry Night socks. Designed to look like the iconic painting, the Starry Night socks are comfy and are a great accessory to a Halloween costume or even cosplay outfit.

Keep your tables clean without needing a drink coaster with these floating coffee mugs. Using a clever support system, the coffee mug floats in the air, keeping your table top safe from hot coffee leaving behind a mark – and its unique shape is surprisingly durable too.

Keep your alcohol close while your on the go with the belt buckle flask. The flask attaches onto your belt like a traditional belt buckle, but it can store around two ounces of sweet sweet alcohol goodness. You might have a drinking problem, but portability isn’t a part of it.

You may not have been bit by a radioactive spider, but you can still deck yourself out with a nice and cozy spidey outfit with this Spiderman snuggie blanket. With sleeved arms, the Spiderman snuggie style blanket is perfect for lounging on the couch and watching cartoons.

With the zombie apocalypse imminent, a must have accessory to blend in and stealthy get past the undead is a zombie brains beanie. While wearing this beanie, it will appear that your brains are exposed and you are among the ever growing undead zombie army.

Now that thumb wrestling is an officially accepted sport at the Olympics, you can now train with unparalleled realism with these thumb wrestling rings. Just have you and your sparring partner slip your thumbs up in the wrestling ring, and have at it!

Teach your children about the greatness of Bill Murray while reliving all his classic roles by coloring in scenes from all his movies. The Bill Murray coloring book, formally known as Thrill Murray, has everything from Ghostbusters to Lost In Translation to color in.

Vinyl records might be an obsolete technology but they function perfectly as dinner placemats. Easy to clean and dishwasher safe, these vinyl record dinner placemats are a great gift idea for the vintage record junkies, and are perfect for music themed parties.

Experience the ultimate in hoodie comfort with these hooded pillowcases. Perfect for lounging around and able to fit any standard size pillow, these hoodie pillowcases will wrap you up in a cocoon of comfort, warmth, and all around awesomeness.

Just like when Michael Jordan retired to go play baseball, the peanut butter and jelly sandwich has realized he has reached his potential as a sandwich and is venturing out to challenge himself – the PB&J is now looking poised to dominate the wallet industry.

Envision your dreams of celebrity stardom with these magazine cover mirrors. Available with major magazine covers such as GQ, Time, Playboy, and Vogue – these clever mirrors make your face the cover piece of the magazine – perfect for the up and coming actors.

Stalk and kill your target like Ezio with this functioning Assassin’s Creed inspired hidden blade; with the flick of the wrist, the replica assassin blade will spring outward. Perfect for cosplay, these life size hidden blades are officially licensed.

Relive the glorious days of drawing awesome masterpieces with crayons while eating your food with these washable draw on tablecloths. Perfect for keeping the kids distracted, these draw on tablecloths use special markers to let you clean and re-use these tablecloths.

Give your home bar or man cave an authentic alcoholic touch with the beer keg stools. Just consume an entire beer keg <del>by yourself</del>, and this stool kit will easily allow you to transform that empty keg into a fully functional bar stool with all the necessary hardware included.

Light up your desk or nightstand with these USB jellyfish shaped lamps. With the ability to switch between a bright white and blue color with the flick of a switch, these jellyfish lamps can also be placed just about anywhere thanks to their suction cup feet.

Dinner parties are great – but how are you supposed to hold onto all that free finger food while still chugging down fancy wine? The answer are these genius finger plates that are great for holding onto h’orderves while still being able to hold your drink.

One of the keys to happiness is not being a slave to the clock – there’s no better way to show your liberation from the time overlords than having a wall clock that shows you couldn’t possibly care less. Get yourself a “Whatever” wall clock and say fuck you, time!

Easily cut a slice of butter with this handy one click butter slicer. Perfect for preparing your toast in the morning, this butter slice cutter also doubles as a compact storage container for your butter, so it doesn’t start hanging out with the wrong crowd in the fridge.

Make every 90s geek at the Halloween party instantly fall in love with you with these Power Ranger dresses. Available in all the original Power Ranger colors, these sexy retro dresses will score you huge brownie points with men who have no idea how to please you.

Light up your home with these Super Mario inspired question block lamps. Perfect for a kid’s room or just a geeky man cave, these Super Mario question block lamps will remind you of simpler times when your habit of eating magic mushrooms wasn’t frowned upon.

There are many cool methods to opening a beer bottle; you can use counter-tops, teeth, or even eye sockets to pop open a cold beer – and now you can even use sunglasses to open your favorite beer with these titanium bottle opener sunglasses.

Add some character to your home with these hand made whiskey barrels that have been converted into coffee tables. Using recycled aged oak whiskey barrels, these unique coffee tables feature a built in storage area and are hand stained for that polished yet rustic look.

Keep that delicious pint of ice cream safe and secure from your fellow gluttons with this ice cream pint lock. Designed perfectly for a Ben and Jerry’s pint of ice cream, these sturdy locks are perfect for deterring ice cream thieves at home or in the office.

Reign supreme on the porcelain throne with this beautifully crafted royal toilet that is fit for a king. With medieval luxury, this wooden royal toilet throne includes a candle holder, ash tray, and even plays a musical chime as the toilet seat gloriously rises.

Protect your kids from getting shocked by covering your wall outlets with these bandage outlet covers. Each bandage outlet cover package includes four plastic covers, and are perfect for adding a fun touch to an otherwise boring task of childproofing your home.

The rich and soulful music of keyboard cat has warmed our hearts, and now you can pay tribute to this musical feline prodigy with the keyboard cat poster. Internet memes might come and go, but with the keyboard cat poster you’ll let his legacy live on forever.

Possess the mighty power of a chainsaw wherever you go with these portable handheld chainsaws that require no gas or electricity. With sharp bi-directional metal teeth, these pocket chainsaws will make quick work of any tree that dare stand in your way.

Look like a quiet badass with these replica scorpion jackets from the movie Drive. With a high level of attention to detail, these scorpion jackets are fully lined and diamond stitched with quilted satin, and of course feature the golden scorpion embroidered on the back.

BBQs are serious business – with the modular tactical grilling apron you’ll be able to configure a variety of different MOLLE attachments so you can carry your ammo, beer, BBQ sauce, and whatever else you think you’ll need for a day of intense grilling.

Control the lighting in your home with the pull of the trigger with these remote controlled gun lamps. With a range of nearly fifty feet, the lamp shade will tilt its angle when you shoot it to turn the light off. It’s a great way to brighten up an otherwise peaceful home.

Light up your home with these coiled wax candles that will burn for 144 hours and will auto-extinguish themselves – making them safer than your traditional candle where you have to worry about blowing them out when you aren’t at home.

Stay in shape even while you stuff your face with food with these dumbbell eating utensils. These fully functional hand made dumbbells each weigh between 2 to 4.5 lbs and will revolutionize the way you eat your food, giving you a work out while you consume.

Ever wondered what it would be like if you snapped your snowboard in half? Wonder no more – the dual snowboards are here. These boot like snowboards perform similar to a regular snowboard, except each board is independently attached to the boarder’s feet.

Let your small dog or cat sleep in the belly of the beast with these self cleaning shark pet beds. Using nanotechnology, these cool shark beds will absorb pet odors and bacteria and are easily cleaned with the fabric lining that unzips for a quick wash.

Get hammered with these nifty ambigram shot glasses that first tell you what to do, then tell you how you feel. The shot glass reads “Drink” when right side up with liquor, and after your shot you can shot the glass down where it’ll now read “Drunk”.

Finger sports have kept us entertained for years in school and while at work, but these finger hockey games take it to a whole new level. Included in this desktop ice hockey set are finger goalie pads, one mini hockey stick, a mini puck and goal, and of course the ice rink.

Crime fighting never stops. Now you can help ward off evil doers in your own home with these superhero caped glasses. Regardless of whether you roll with Batman or Superman, both of these glasses are dishwasher safe with a removable cape.

Power your appliances with this genius flexible surge protector that can pivot and bend into circular and zig zag shapes so that those bulky power adapters don’t take up two outlets. Perfect for the home or office, this snake-like surge protector is a must have tool.

Tear up the half pipe or just cruise the board walk with this Homer Simpson skateboard. This complete longboard skateboard comes with wheels and trucks, and will be an eye catcher amongst your skater friends. There’s also a Duff Beer skateboard for the drinkers.

Toss out that bottle of Rogaine, because Science™ and lasers have teamed up to create an infallible technique to re-grow your hair and stop balding at the source! Just put the hair growing helmet on, don’t ask questions, and let the lasers take care of the rest.
